General.Name: Dongguan Golden Sun Abrasives Co Ltd
General.Description: Dongguan Golden Sun Abrasives Co.,Ltd. research, develops, manufactures, and sells grinding and polishing materials, intelligent equipment, and provision of precision structural parts manufacturing services in China. The company serves grinding of glass, ceramics, synthetic materials, metals, wood, and other sectors. It also exports its products. Dongguan Golden Sun Abrasives Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Dongguan, China.
